Straight Shot was about to stick up for herself just as Tucson gets up from=
 his bench and for the first time actually gets a bit short tempered with L=
eo Prime.  He puts his feet down firmly as he stands beside his sister and =
Rattrap.  If not in voice, he shows it in posture and body language.

" For=
 every action there is a reaction.  Perhaps you missed Wheelie's snide rema=
rk to Rattrap and my sister's efforts to defend him.  YOU WILL NOT COME IN =
BETWEEN MY SISTER LEO!  THATS AN ORDER!"

Rattrap and Straight Shot freeze =
in shock.  No one had ever yelled at Leo Prime.  Not even Tucson, who was n=
ow clearly in an unstable temperament.

" That is so not like him, well he'=
s short tempered but not that short tempered."

Rattrap nods.

" Yeah no on=
es ever raised their voice at Leo, not like that.  Something is bothering h=
im big time.  Or maybe it's a dragon thing.  Look at Hydras, he's got a tem=
per too."

Tucson paces the floor.  It was clear there was more to his mood=
 than meets the eye.  So much so that he returns to his beast mode, snappin=
g his tail angrily, with a bit of a snarl.

" Let me remind you that before=
 you were chosen as a leader, I was chosen first.  And I will not be underm=
ined by anyone.  And if I wish to wait and allow Elita the freedom of choic=
e then so be it.  If she choses not to then that is her choice and I will h=
onor it willingly.  She has a voice and it deserves to be heard, not just s=
hoved in a corner and put to rest.  I will not tolerate prohibition of free=
dom nor the right to defend one's self accordingly.  Am I understood!?"

He=
 slams his tail down hard enough for the floor to shake.

Perpetually on th=
e move and constantly busy.
